400937DB.Line17.B2A71: Donan? Ach, now there’s a good man. A champion of the faith.

5E6DA036.Line21.B2A71: I know Donan’s been through some hard times of late, so I’m happy to help him however I can.

F71560C6.Line3.B2A71: Not like that old crank you were with earlier. What was his name? Lorfam? Morath? Heh, doesn’t matter.

F86219B8.Line23.B2A71: Take one of my steeds, free of charge.

FB3FFC35.MenuLabel: “I’m a friend of Donan’s. He said you could provide a horse.”
